K12D0422_H0382:1b-1: shr'i dzny'a na ti la ka yo gi n'i tantra

K12D0422_H0382:7b-5: 'pho ba'i dus shar ba dang nub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12D0422_H0382:7b-6: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12D0422_H0382:7b-8: de nyid gsum bdag nga ro ci //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-9: de bzhin zla ba'i bde ba mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:7b-10: phyag rgya chen po'i rnam pa ci //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-11: de yi mtha' ni ji ltar lags //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0422_H0382:7b-13: de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs; ;rdo rje gsung ni ye shes mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:7b-14: zla ba'i bde ba mchog ces pa //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-15: de yi phung po dbang po khams //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-16: phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-17: de yi mtha' ni bha gar dran //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-18: mtha' dang snang ba rnam par shes //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-19: chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-20: chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-21: snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-22: skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-24: de'i phyi rol chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni /
K12D0422_H0382:7b-25: bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o //
K12D0422_H0382:7b-26: de la dang po rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bskyed pa sgom pa dang /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-1: dbang bskur gyi rim pa de dag bshad do //
K12D0422_H0382:8a-2: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-3: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-4: zla ba mchog gi bde ba dang /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-5: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la sogs pa'i phyogs tsam bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0422_H0382:8a-6: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa; tshangs pa'i rus pa
K12D0422_H0382:8a-7: srog gi dbyug pa'i steng dang 'og gi 'pho ba
K12D0422_H0382:8a-8: cha gnyis su rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang
K12D0422_H0382:8a-9: bzhin las le'u dang por gang gsungs pa ni /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-10: de rnams kyi nang nas gcig tu rtog med bde
K12D0422_H0382:8a-11: legs yid ma gcig pu nges par bstan par mdzad
K12D0422_H0382:8a-13: rtsa gzhan rnams ci'i don phyir 'dir ma gsungs /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-15: gcig pu rtog med bde legs yid ma de ni /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-16: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi phra mo'i
K12D0422_H0382:8a-17: dra ba rnams rol mo'i don du byas nas sna
K12D0422_H0382:8a-18: tshogs kyi bdud rtsi bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-19: chos kyi 'byung gnas chen po'i sa steng du 'byung zhing skye'i /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-20: char 'bab pa'i don du bstan pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:8a-21: lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12D0422_H0382:8a-22: de ltar lags mod kyang rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig
K12D0422_H0382:8a-23: po rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs 'dir mchog gi dbang
K12D0422_H0382:8b-0: bcom ldan @8b 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0422_H0382:8b-2: sum cu rtsa gcig gi ming rnams nyon cig /
K12D0422_H0382:8b-35: rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig ste /
K12D0422_H0382:8b-36: steng dang 'og tu 'pho ba gnyis kyi zla ba
K12D0422_H0382:8b-37: dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su tshigs rgyas
K12D0422_H0382:8b-38: pa'o // de nas dbang gi rim pa bshad ste /
K12D0422_H0382:8b-39: ji ltar yi ni go rim du //
K12D0422_H0382:8b-40: dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa gang //
K12D0422_H0382:8b-41: thams cad du ni nus par 'gyur //
K12D0422_H0382:8b-42: yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu //
K12D0422_H0382:8b-43: bla mas dang por dbang bskur bya //
K12D0422_H0382:8b-44: khrus byas mig dag ras kyis dgab //
K12D0422_H0382:8b-45: snyim pa me tog gis bkang ldan; ;yon phul nas ni dga' dang bcas //
K12D0422_H0382:8b-46: lha yi dbang phyug dbang bskur byas //
K12D0422_H0382:8b-47: dbang bskur nas ni sangs rgyas sa //
K12D0422_H0382:8b-48: the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-2: dpal ldan dbang rgyal blang bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-3: dbang bskur bzhi ru phye ba ni //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-4: slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yin //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-5: dang por slob dpon gyi ni dbang //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-6: gnyis pa de ni gsang ba'i dbang //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-7: gsum pa shes rab ye shes dbang //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-8: de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-9: bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-10: slob dpon dbang la sogs par bskur //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-11: rdo rje slob dpon dbang gsum du //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-12: nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-13: de gnyis la ni bcu gcig phye //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-14: rdo rje slob dpon dbang rgyal lo //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-15: dbang bskur de ni rin po che //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-16: khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-18: 'di ru rim pas bdag gis bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-19: chu dang dbu rgyan rdo rje dang //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-20: dril bu ming dang brtul zhugs dang //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-21: lung bstan pa dang skyabs sbyin dang //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-22: phyag rgya sngags dang ye shes so //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-23: rnal 'byor rgyud la mos pa la //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-24: dbang brgyad phye la sbyin par bya; ;rnal 'byor bla ma la mos pa //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-25: bcu gcig bdag nyid sbyin par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-26: rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-27: gsang ba'i dbang ni sbyin pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-28: gsang ba gnyis su dbye bar gsungs //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-29: de ni phyi dang nang gis so //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-31: dbang bskur shes pas sbyin par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:9a-32: nang gi rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-0: gsang ba'i @9b dbang ni rab tu sbyin //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-1: de ni gsang ba gsum du dbye //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-2: skye dang mdud dang de bzhin sad //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-3: shes rab rnams pa gnyis su dbye //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-4: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go /
K12D0422_H0382:9b-5: shes rab brgyad gnyis lo dang ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-6: spyan ring cha la mkhas pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-7: yan lag tsandan gsar pa'i dri //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-8: shin tu 'jam pa'i khu bas tshim //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-9: gzugs bzang sngo la skal ldan ma; ;'o 'dzin mkhrang zhing 'jam la mtho //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-10: bsam gtan sngags la dad cing zhi //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-11: dbang bskur dang ldan thugs rje grub //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-12: de lta'i rab grags 'bad de btsal //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-13: dbang gi don du bla mar zhu //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-14: de kun mtshan nyid dang ldan pa //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-15: chung ma yang na sring mo 'am //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-16: bu mo yang na mna' ma 'am //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-17: mkhas pas 'bad de blang bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-18: rang gi rigs ni ji bzhin rnyed //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-19: khu ba dang bcas gzhon nu ma //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-20: sna tshogs rgyan gyis legs par brgyan //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-21: mkhas pas bla ma la ni dbul //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-22: dbang gi man ngag gsum du bzhugs //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-23: nang gi yi ni brda byed pa //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-24: bzhi pa 'bras bu'i ngo bor grags //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-25: gsum dang bral ba'i gsum bdag nyid //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-26: dga' ba la sogs bye brag tu //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-27: rdo rje gzhon nu mas gsal dbye //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-28: dbang bskur gyis ni 'khor los bsgyur //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-29: the tshom med par yin par 'gyur //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-30: dbang gis dri ma med par byed //
K12D0422_H0382:9b-31: chu la sogs pas ras bkrus bzhin //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-2: yan lag de nyid dang ni bcas //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-3: gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyud //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-4: bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang /
K12D0422_H0382:10a-5: g /zhan du rtog ga'i tshogs la mkhas //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-6: sgra yi bstan bcos rtag mos la //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-7: dbang gi mchog ni rnam pa gsum //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-8: blang bar mi bya sbyin mi bya //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-9: yang dag 'bras bu 'dod pa ni; ;de ni ring du blang bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-10: de ltar yang bye ma du ma bsdus pa'i phung
K12D0422_H0382:10a-11: po la 'bad de rnam par btsir bas mar khu'i
K12D0422_H0382:10a-12: thigs pa phyed kyang mi 'byung ngo //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-13: de bzhin du rtog ge mang po dang /
K12D0422_H0382:10a-14: ngag gi dra ba dang ldan pa bstan pa'am /
K12D0422_H0382:10a-15: nyan pa las ni de la nyon mongs pa 'ba' zhig las gzhan 'bras bu ni /
K12D0422_H0382:10a-17: de bas na gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyud de rnyed pa'i dbang shes pa de ni /
K12D0422_H0382:10a-18: rdo rje slob dpon bla ma chen po'o //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-19: mi gsal mchog gi bkra shis can //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-20: sangs rgyas 'bras bu sbyin pa'i sbyin //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-21: bla ma'i gzugs so gzhan ma yin //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-22: bsod nams thams cad kyi ni gnas //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-23: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-24: tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug la //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-25: de kun gyis ni bdag mchod 'os //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-26: ma grags kyang ni grags gzugs yin //
K12D0422_H0382:10a-27: de ltar shes nas sgrub pa pos //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-0: 'bad pa yis ni mchod @10b par bya; ;bla ma'i zhal snga mchod byas na //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-2: rgyud kyi don nam dbang gi don //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-3: shes nas bla ma mi mchod pa //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-4: sa steng nyi zla yod bar du //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-5: de ni mnar med pa ru 'gro //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-6: de bas kun tu 'bad pa yis //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-7: gus pas bla ma mchod par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-8: rin chen sna tshogs bzor byas legs //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-9: gser gyi padma dri ma med //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-10: mu tig do shal rin thang med //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-11: sna tshogs du ma yi ni gos //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-12: gces pa'i btsun mo bu dang bcas //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-13: glang po rta dang bran la sogs //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-14: dpal ldan bla ma'i spyan snga ru //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-15: dad gus brtan pas dbul bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-16: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12D0422_H0382:10b-17: yon dbul ba dang bcas pa'i dbang gi rim pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12D0422_H0382:10b-18: de nas gzhan yang rab bshad nyon //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-19: gnas kyi rnyed pa ji bzhin don //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-20: ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-21: rdo rje rtsig pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-22: rdo rje'i thig dang bla re ni //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-23: kun tu yongs su bskor ba yin; ;rlung la sogs pa'i rig pas dbye //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-24: 'byung ba bzhi dang ldan pa yin //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-25: ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha' kun tu //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-26: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-27: rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-29: rtsibs bcu pa la gser gyi mdog /
K12D0422_H0382:10b-30: khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:10b-31: khro bo thams cad zhal gsum pa //
K12D0422_H0382:11a-4: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-7: dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-8: aag tshom dang smin ma che zhing ring ba ste /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-9: shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshin rje gshed sku
K12D0422_H0382:11a-10: mdog nag po g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni
K12D0422_H0382:11a-12: phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang rtse gsum pa /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-13: phyag g-yon gnyis na thod pa dang dbyug pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:11a-14: lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po g-yas kyi zhal dmar ba /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-16: phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang ral gri /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-17: phyag g-yon pa gnyis na mtshon rtse gcig dang mgo bo'o //
K12D0422_H0382:11a-18: nub tu padma mthar byed dmar po zhal g-yas dkar zhing g-yon sngon po /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-19: g-yas dang g-yon gyi bzhin ral gri dang 'khor lo dang /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-20: zla ba phyed pa dang ri rab zur brgyad pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:11a-21: byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-23: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag bzhin rdo rje rgya gram dang ral gri dang /
K12D0422_H0382:11a-25: me'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs can g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis ni /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-1: g-yas phyag gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-2: phyag g-yon na sta re dang mdung thung ngo //
K12D0422_H0382:11b-3: srin po'i mtshams su dbyug pa sngon po chu srin 'dzin ser po'i gzugs /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-4: g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ljang ba dang dmar ba /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-5: phyag g-yas gnyis na rgya gram rtse gsum dang ral gri /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-6: phyag g-yon gnyis na s'a la'i shing chen po dang /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-8: rlung mtshams su stobs po che du ba'i mdog /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-9: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-11: phyag bzhi la ral gri dang dung dang /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-12: dgra sta dang rnga ma'o; ;dbang ldan gyi mtshams su
K12D0422_H0382:11b-13: mi g-yo mgon dkar nag zhal g-yon dmar po dang
K12D0422_H0382:11b-14: g-yas sngon po / g-yas g-yon gyi phyag bzhin ral gri dang lcags kyu dang /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-15: pi wang dang rde'u chung ngo //
K12D0422_H0382:11b-16: steng du gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba sku mdog ser po g-yas dang g-yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-18: phyag bzhin 'khor lo dang ral gri dang /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-19: ka p'a la dang kha tv'am ga'o //
K12D0422_H0382:11b-20: 'og tu sum bha'i rgyal po sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo ba /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-21: g-yas kyi zhal mthon mthing chen po'i 'od can /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-24: g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang lcags kyu /
K12D0422_H0382:11b-25: g-yon gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:12a-0: thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang @12a *//
K12D0422_H0382:12a-2: rang gi 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:12a-3: 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa ni /
K12D0422_H0382:12a-4: 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi steng du'o //
K12D0422_H0382:12a-5: gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang sum bha'i rgyal po ni /
K12D0422_H0382:12a-6: zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng du shes par bya'o //
K12D0422_H0382:12a-7: 'di 'khor lo'i lte ba gru gsum gyi gzugs te /
K12D0422_H0382:12a-8: ri bong can dkar po'i 'od chos kyi 'byung gnas so //
K12D0422_H0382:12a-9: de'i dbus su sngar bstan pa'i 'byung ba bzhi ji
K12D0422_H0382:12a-10: lta bu'i rim pas rnam par snang mdzad yongs su
K12D0422_H0382:12a-11: gyur pa las dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gzhal
K12D0422_H0382:12a-12: yas khang yangs pa chen po'i 'phar ma gnyis nyi
K12D0422_H0382:12a-13: ma'i gdan du sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad kyi
K12D0422_H0382:12a-14: lte bar 'jigs byed dang dus mtshan gyi bde byed
K12D0422_H0382:12a-15: ma'i steng du tshul dang thigs pa'i rang gi ngo
K12D0422_H0382:12a-16: bo a'a li dang k'a li gnyis las byung ba
K12D0422_H0382:12a-17: / mam h'um las dpal ye shes thig le phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhal brgyad pa /
K12D0422_H0382:12a-25: autpa la sngon po'i 'dab ma lta bu'o; ;rdo rje dang /
K12D0422_H0382:12b-0: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba tshes pas ral pa'i dbu rgyan @12b dang /
K12D0422_H0382:12b-1: dpral bar thod pa'i steng du mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no //
K12D0422_H0382:12b-2: phyag rgya drug gis sku bcings pa //
K12D0422_H0382:12b-3: rgyu mas brgyus pa'i mgo bo chen po'i do shal gyis sku brgyan pa /
K12D0422_H0382:12b-4: tshangs pa'i pags pa'i rked pa'i sham thabs can gyi
K12D0422_H0382:12b-5: skur bzhengs shing he ha'i gad rgyangs dang phem ka
K12D0422_H0382:12b-6: ra'i tshol ba'i sgra chen po'i nga ro bsgrags shing
K12D0422_H0382:12b-7: brjod pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i g-yul sa bye ba'i
K12D0422_H0382:12b-8: grangs kyi thod pa'i lto ba brlag par mdzad pa
K12D0422_H0382:12b-11: lce spyang gi tshogs 'jigs su rung ba dang /
K12D0422_H0382:12b-12: sha za'i tshogs ha har dgod pa dang /
K12D0422_H0382:12b-13: nag po'i me can gyi dur khrod chen po brgyad
K12D0422_H0382:12b-14: na 'jigs byed kyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa'i gar
K12D0422_H0382:12b-15: byed pa'o // dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12D0422_H0382:12b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0422_H0382:12b-17: da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba //
K12D0422_H0382:12b-19: sa yi cha ni mnyam pa'i mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:12b-20: sbrang rtsi ga pur gyis ni byug /
K12D0422_H0382:12b-21: dri zhim pa yi me tog bkram //
K12D0422_H0382:12b-22: me tog gis ni chal par dgram //
K12D0422_H0382:12b-23: chu ngogs yang na thang stong du //
K12D0422_H0382:12b-24: rdo rje skud pa yis ni bskor; ;mig mdzes rdo rje gzhon nu ma //
K12D0422_H0382:12b-25: zla ba nyi mas padma khengs //
K12D0422_H0382:12b-26: lang tsho gsar la reg bya 'jam //
K12D0422_H0382:12b-27: dang po mkhas pas 'jug par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-0: sngags kyi gnas kyi lugs ji @13a *//
K12D0422_H0382:13a-1: bzhin; ;legs dgyes shin tu sbyor bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-2: de yi sbyor ba gang zhig 'byung //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-3: kha dang sa sogs mchod par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-5: rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-6: mkhas pas khro ba'i sngags kyis gdab //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-7: a'a li k'a li mnyam byas nas //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-8: 'dab ma kun la rim pas dgod //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-9: a'a li ye shes 'dab ma gcig /
K12D0422_H0382:13a-10: k'a li 'dab ma bdun du dran //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-11: 'dab ma re re yi ge lnga //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-12: lnga pa lnga ni lnga la'o //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-13: 'dab ma gnyis su bzhi gnyis te //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-14: ksha yi yig 'bru lte nang ngo //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-15: dbyangs yig gsal yig bye brag tu //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-16: a'a li k'a li 'du shes yin //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-17: gnyis kyi yi ge 'dab ma yis //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-18: sngags kyi rgyal po de nyid dran //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-19: dang po'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i dbang //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-20: de nas 'dab gnyis kyi dbang por //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-21: bzhi pa'i dbyangs yig dang bcas pa //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-22: 'og tu re pha yis ni brgyan //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-23: de nas nyi shu rtsa lnga ni //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-25: dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-26: khro bo ngan 'gro dag byed pa //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-27: 'dab gnyis dang po bzhi ba yin //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-28: de nas gsal byed pa yis brgyan //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-29: 'dab gnyis dang po gnyis pa yin; ;ldan pa thams cad rims 'phrog byed //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-30: gsal byed pa la gsum pa ste //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-31: bcu pas yang dag ldan pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:13a-32: dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa yis //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-0: lha yi dbang phyug @13b brgyan pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-1: bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-2: de nas de yi dang po'o //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-3: bcu drug pa la gsum pas ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-4: thams cad sngags kyi tshig gi gzhi //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-5: de nas sa ni dag pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-6: de bzhin gsal byed dang po'o //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-7: yan lag gsal byed sum cu gsum //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-8: dbyangs yig drug pa yang dag ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-9: thams cad kyi ni 'byung ba'i gzhi //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-10: zla tshes thig les rnam par brgyan //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-11: de ni de dang nye bar gnas //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-12: sems kyi dbang phyug yi ge mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:13b-13: gang zhig lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-14: gsum pa'i dang po dang ldan pa //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-15: mthar ni sv'ah'a ldan pa ste; ;snying po'i sngags ni rmad byung mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:13b-16: dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:13b-18: 'og tu re pha yang dag ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-19: dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas sbyar; ;rig pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:13b-20: thig le yis ni mgo bo mnan //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-21: de ring du ni nye bar gnas //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-22: thams cad zhi ba zhi ba'i mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:13b-23: thigs pas mnan pas sum cu gsum //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-24: bcu drug pa ni gnyis par ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-25: yang ni de nyid yi ge mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:13b-26: khams gsum mun pa sel bar byed //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-27: h'um phat de ni gnyis ka sbyar //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-28: tha mar sv'ah'a yis ni ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-29: nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes bya //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-30: bcom ldan ye shes thig les so //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-31: dang por rnam par snang mdzad dag /
K12D0422_H0382:13b-32: nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so //
K12D0422_H0382:13b-33: gsal byed pa ni gzhi gnyis pa //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-2: nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa yi gzhan //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-3: dbyangs kyi yi ge bdun pas ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-4: bzhi pa las ni gsum pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-5: de dang nye bar rlung yin no; ;dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-6: 'bras bu thams cad don sbyin no //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-7: lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-8: lha yi yig 'bru de yang nye //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-9: lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-10: nyi shu rtsa brgyad de nas so //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-11: lnga pa yi ni dang po dang //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-12: nyi shu rtsa bdun de nas so //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-13: dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pas ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-14: khams gsum dgug par nus pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-15: gsal byed kyi ni dang po dang //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-16: nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-17: nyi shu rtsa lnga pa dag dang //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-18: dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-19: nyi shu rtsa drug yi ge mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:14a-20: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-21: sv'ah'a mtha' ru ldan pa ni //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-22: h'um h'um phat gyis spel bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-23: de ni phyag rgya che snying po //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-24: yid bzhin rin chen mnyam pa'i 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-25: dang po yi ni pra na pa //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-26: de nas 'dab gnyis pa yi gsum //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-27: ya yi sde tshan gnyis pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-28: nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-29: dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa yis //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-30: snying la khong du chud par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-31: drug cu rtsa bzhi phyed dag pa //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-32: ra yi yig 'bru de dang mnyam //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-33: mtha mar sv'ah'a dang ldan pa //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-34: h'um h'um phat ni spel ba yin //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-35: nye ba'i snying po sngags cen po //
K12D0422_H0382:14a-36: thams cad sngags kyi bdag nyid mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:14a-37: aom shr'i ma h'a k'a ru na kru ta /
K12D0422_H0382:14b-1: spha ra na ma h'a ka wa na t'a ghe /
K12D0422_H0382:14b-2: sa ma pra bha dza ya bi dza ya aatt'atta h'a sa /
K12D0422_H0382:14b-3: ma h'a gho ra gho re shva ra ma h'a b'i ra b'i re shva ra /
K12D0422_H0382:14b-4: ma h'a ru dhi r'am tra m'a la dha ra /
K12D0422_H0382:14b-5: soo ma s'urya aagni lo tsa na; a'a k'a sho da ra /
K12D0422_H0382:14b-6: ma h'a s'a ga ra ko ga ge /
K12D0422_H0382:14b-13: a'a karsha ya a'a karsha ya /
K12D0422_H0382:14b-14: bhanydza ya bhanydza ya; ts'urna ya ts'urna ya /

K12D0422_H0382:14b-40: aom hi hi hi hi h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-0: aom ma h'a ru dhi ra p'a ni @15a *//
K12D0422_H0382:15a-2: aom h'um h'um h'um h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-3: aom phat phat phat phat h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-4: phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog gi lha //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-5: las thams cad ni rab grub byed //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-6: aom ma h'a k'a ma r'u pe ni yi sa ra sa ra /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-7: bi sa ra bi sa ra /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-9: sarb'artha s'a dha ya s'a dha ya /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-12: ma h'a b'i ra b'i re shva ra sapta p'a t'a la /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-15: shu sha ne ru sha ne mu ha ne /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-18: tree lokya bha yam ka re /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-19: ham ham him him h'um h'um/
K12D0422_H0382:15a-25: sa ma pra bh'a ya h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-26: phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog gi lha //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-27: bcom ldan mo yi bdag gis bstan //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-44: 'khor lo'i sngags ni sngags chen po //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-45: dpa' bo rnams kyi snying po mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:15a-46: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee aa aoo aam aa:/
K12D0422_H0382:15a-47: dpa' bo'i yan lag ma snying sngags //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-48: lha yi dbang phyug bdag gis bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-49: dang po ra aom dang mthar h'um phat//
K12D0422_H0382:15a-50: bar du ming ni spel ba'o //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-51: gsang ba'i sngags kyi dgod pa ni //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-52: mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:15a-53: aom n'a da ni rma l'a ya h'um h'um phat/
K12D0422_H0382:15a-54: aom bindur tha ga me h'um h'um phat/
K12D0422_H0382:15b-0: aom @15b [?] svah'a k'a l'a gr'a ya h'um h'um h'um phat/
K12D0422_H0382:15b-1: aom n'a da ma tra sva r'u p'a ya h'um h'um phat/
K12D0422_H0382:15b-2: aom pa ra shu ra p'a ya h'um h'um phat/
K12D0422_H0382:15b-3: aom aa pa ra ma na bu g'a ya h'um h'um phat/
K12D0422_H0382:15b-4: ye shes drug gi mchog sngags dbang //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-5: 'khor lo drug pa'i nang na bzhugs //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-6: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-7: 'di yi sngags kyis mchod par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-8: aa ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha sgra ni grags //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-9: sde tshan brgyad kyi gtso bo yin //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-10: rtsa ba'i sde tshan gtor ma gtang //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-11: brtag pa gnyis kyi ji bzhin no //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-12: rdo rje'i phyag rgya'am snying po yis //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-13: mig mi 'dzum pa'i lta bas sbyin //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-14: srung 'khor yod pa'i khro bo yin //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-15: de yi sngags ni bdag gis bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-17: ghu ghu ro ghu ghu ro //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-19: bi dha ra bi dha ra /
K12D0422_H0382:15b-20: ta ghe ta ta ghe ta /
K12D0422_H0382:15b-21: spho li gi spho li gi /
K12D0422_H0382:15b-22: aa ta aa ta ha sa /
K12D0422_H0382:15b-25: bi kra ma bi kra ma /
K12D0422_H0382:15b-26: h'um phat kyis ni mtha' ma ra ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-27: bar du ming ni spel ba 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-28: rdo rje gsum pa ye shes rgyal //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-29: aom a'a: h'um ni sngags kyi mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:15b-30: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12D0422_H0382:15b-31: sngags btu ba zhes pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12D0422_H0382:15b-32: de nas mchod sbyin rab bdag bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-33: gnas la sogs pa'i rim pas sbyor //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-34: bskyed pa'i bye brag thigs pa gsum //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-35: rdzogs pa'i rim gsum de ltar ro //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-36: rnam shes la sogs bye brag tu //
K12D0422_H0382:15b-37: mchod sbyin tshangs pa'i g-yul sa che //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-2: snang dang nam mkha' ye shes bzhin //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-3: sku brgyad kyi ni bye brag tu //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-4: dngos po rten dang rnam par 'byed //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-5: ji bzhin 'dod ba sdud pa ni //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-7: aoodyan la sogs gnas su ni //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-8: legs dgyes ma sogs lha mo kun //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-9: k'a li ye shes yig mchog sbyin //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-10: phyi dang nang du bya ba'o //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-11: mchod sbyin byas na sbyin pa che //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-12: 'bras bu bkra shis ldan pa skye //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-13: sems can rnams kyi bye brag tu //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-14: sna tshogs thabs ni rab tu bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-15: kha cig la ni 'dul ba'i thabs //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-16: kha cig rnams la mdo sde'o //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-17: la la pha rol phyin pa'i lam /
K12D0422_H0382:16a-18: kha cig la ni sngags kyi mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:16a-19: rab 'bring tha ma'i bye brag tu //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-20: thar par 'gro ba'i thabs yin no //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-21: blo gros che yang theg gzhan gyis //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-22: grangs med gsum gyis sangs rgyas yin //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-23: sngags kyi theg pa la mos na //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-24: tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas so; ;yang ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-25: rnal 'byor ma khyod smos ci dgos //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-26: yang na lus ni spangs ma thag /
K12D0422_H0382:16a-27: bla na med pa'i ye shes dag /
K12D0422_H0382:16a-28: brtson par mi ldan pas kyang rnyed //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-29: brtson 'grus ldan pas smos ci dgos //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-30: brtan pa'i brtson pas don thams cad //
K12D0422_H0382:16a-32: don kun grub pa'i bsod nams can //
K12D0422_H0382:16b-0: rtog med nyon @16b mongs med pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:16b-1: gang zhig las ni ci byed pa //
K12D0422_H0382:16b-2: de ni bsod nams 'phel ba yin //
K12D0422_H0382:16b-3: 'dod pa'i longs spyod gang gang spyod //
K12D0422_H0382:16b-4: de kun mchod pa la sogs yin //
K12D0422_H0382:16b-5: de ni mchod sbyin 'phel ba yin //
K12D0422_H0382:16b-6: mchod las ye shes 'bras bu rnyed //
K12D0422_H0382:16b-7: de ni mchod sbyin yang dag pa //

K12D0422_H0382:29a-8: to // ye shes nyi ma bcom ldan 'das //

K12D0422_H0382:30a-14: ser po dmar po ljang gu'i zhal //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-15: ri bong can ni g-yon bskor zhing //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-16: zhal gzhan kun ni bung ba bzhin //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-18: gshin rje'i pags pas rnam dkris byas //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-19: dam bcas don phyir brtul zhugs don //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-20: sangs rgyas phreng ba'i do shal byas //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-21: mgo bo yi ni chun 'phyang brgyan /
K12D0422_H0382:30a-22: gar dgu yi ni ro dang ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-23: sku ni phyag rgya drug gis mdzes //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-24: sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-26: ye shes mkha' 'gro bde ba che //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-27: legs dgyes dbang mo gnyis med sbyor //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-28: dur khrod kyi ni thal bas byugs //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-29: rten du bgrad pas bde bar bzhugs //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-30: g-yas brkyang ba yi gar dang ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:30a-31: gsang ba'i don gnas ba rda byed pa //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-0: mkha' @30b 'gro ma yi tshogs kyis bskor //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-1: dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na bzhugs //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-2: rdo rje dril bu gnyis med sbyor //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-3: tshangs pa yi ni pags pas bebs //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-4: mda' gzhu 'khor lo rin po che; ;ral gri rtse gsum rde'i chung dang //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-5: zla ba nyi ma sta re snod //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-6: kha tv'am ga dang thod pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-8: yang na phyag ni gnyis ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-10: zhi ba spyan ni gsum pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-11: nang gi 'phar ma dgyes pa ni //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-12: zla ba gang ba bzhin du bdag /
K12D0422_H0382:30b-13: sna tshogs padma yi ni gzhi //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-14: 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-15: phyi ma gru bzhi ru ni grags //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-16: sna tshogs rdo rje'i steng du'o //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-17: yi dvags chen po'i phreng bas ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-18: sna tshogs dpa' bos nye bar mdzes //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-19: sna tshogs pa yi shing gis bskor //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-20: sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma dang ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-21: de'i nang du gru gsum gyi phyag rgya'i grva ni //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-27: spyi bor legs dgyes rdo rje ma dang //
K12D0422_H0382:30b-29: rdo rje glang chen ma bcom ldan 'das la skul
K12D0422_H0382:30b-30: par byed cing phyag gi 'phar ma 'bar bar ro
K12D0422_H0382:30b-31: mchog chen po'i snod kyis mchod sbyin 'bul bar byed
K12D0422_H0382:30b-32: cing tshangs pa'i bu gar rtse sbyar gyi phyag rgya
K12D0422_H0382:31a-0: byed pa ste // mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sprel te lhag mas mthe bong mnan na @31a *//
K12D0422_H0382:31a-1: mdzub mo sbyar ba 'og tu bcings pa'i sku'i yi
K12D0422_H0382:31a-2: dvags chen po'i steng na g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa
K12D0422_H0382:31a-4: skra grol zhing na bza' grol ba; chu skyes rgyas pa /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-5: bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing bzhugs pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31a-6: shar gyi phyogs su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar k'a ma ru pa ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-8: de'i shar gyi 'dab mar m'a la wa ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-12: nub kyi 'dab mar na ga ra ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-13: rna ba gnyis su 'jigs byed ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31a-16: byang mtshams su sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar mummu ni ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-18: de'i shar gyi 'dab mar de wi ko ti ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-19: ske'i gling bur rta mgrin ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31a-20: byang gi 'dab mar ku lu ta ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-21: rgyab kyi gling bur rta rna ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31a-22: nub kyi 'dab mar aarbu ta ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-23: nu ma gnyis su glang chen sna ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31a-24: lho'i 'dab mar ta li ki li ba ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-25: snying gar glang chen lto ba ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31a-26: nub phyogs kyi sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lta bar go da wa ri ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-27: lte ba'i gnas su me ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31a-28: de'i shar gyi 'dab ma lam pa ka ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31a-29: gsang ba'i padmar chu rgyun ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-0: byang gi 'dab mar @31b kanytsi ka ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-1: mtshan gyi dbus su ri bong can ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-2: nub kyi 'dab mar las kyi yul te /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-5: bshang kha'i gnas su dung sna ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-6: lho phyogs kyi padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar kongka na ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-7: brla gnyis su dung gtsug ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-9: pus mo gnyis su dung lte pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-10: byang gi 'dab mar yi dvags 'dus pa ste //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-11: rje ngar gnyis su stobs chen ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-12: nub kyi 'dab mar rgya mtsho'i ngogs te /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-13: rkang pa gnyis su bya rgod ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-14: lha'i 'dab mar tsa ri tra ste /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-15: sor mo la rgod kha ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-16: de'i sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bzhi'i 'dab ma la dgod do //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-17: 'dab ma lhag ma ku la khrag chen pos shin
K12D0422_H0382:31b-18: tu gang ba'i k'a pa la dang ldan pa'i sna
K12D0422_H0382:31b-19: tshogs chen po'i bum pa kha rgyan btsugs pa //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-20: bdud rtsi chen pos lto ba gang ba /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-21: der sna tshogs kyis mgrin pa mtho bar bskor ba'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-22: shar mtshams su ku mar pu ri dang /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-24: mthe bong dang lus thams cad la hor pa ma dang hor mig ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:31b-25: byang mtshams su ke ra ta dang /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-27: rkang pa gnyis la lhag par hor mgo ma dang /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-29: nub mtshams su kam pu dza dang /
K12D0422_H0382:31b-32: snying gar mig dmar dang srog ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:32a-1: su byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ba lang spyod de /
K12D0422_H0382:32a-3: sprul pa'i snying por 'dzin ma dang ro ma'o //
K12D0422_H0382:32a-4: 'dzam bu'i gling du gdegs pa'i padma'i snar bcom ldan 'das dang aa wa dh'u ti'o //
K12D0422_H0382:32a-6: nang gi 'phar mas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo
K12D0422_H0382:32a-7: na yod pa'i rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par
K12D0422_H0382:32a-8: dag par phyi ma phyi mar rgyud kyi go rim
K12D0422_H0382:32a-9: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang gi dag pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:32a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang
K12D0422_H0382:32a-11: phyug phyi rol tu mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan
K12D0422_H0382:32a-12: pa; rnam pa dang bcas pa brgyad gnyis kyi lo'o
K12D0422_H0382:32a-13: // byad gzugs mdzes pa chen po'i sha rgyas pas dregs pa /
K12D0422_H0382:32a-17: sra zhing mtho ba'i nu ma dang /
K12D0422_H0382:32a-18: rus pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12D0422_H0382:32a-20: g-yon brkyang pas ro'i steng na gnas pa /
K12D0422_H0382:32a-24: bdud grangs med pa 'joms pa kho na sku mdog sna tshogs pa /
K12D0422_H0382:32a-26: thugs rje chen pos sems can 'gugs ma /
K12D0422_H0382:32a-27: sems can gyi don mdzad pa la brtson pa /
K12D0422_H0382:32a-28: brel ba dang mi mkhyen pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:32a-29: phyi'i 'phar ma shar dang byang dang nub dang lho
K12D0422_H0382:32b-0: mtshams @32b re rer nang gi lha mo bzhin du
K12D0422_H0382:32b-13: lho'i sgo re rer sgo skyong ma gnyis gnyis te /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-14: de dag kyang dregs pa chen po 'jigs pa chen mo mchog gi legs dgyes kyis rings pa /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-15: sna tshogs kyi nyams kyis sku khyab pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:32b-16: shar sgor rdo rje ro langs ma dang /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-17: rdo rje dra ba ma sku mdog nag po phyag bzhi ma /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-18: mda' gzhu 'gengs shing chu srin dang nya bsnams pa /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-19: ka p'e la dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-23: mi'i rus pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-25: mgo po'i chun 'phyang rgyu ma las brgyus pa 'chang pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:32b-26: byang sgor rdo rje rtse mo ma dang /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-27: de bzhin du rdo rje zlum pa ma sku mdog ser mo seng+ge dang bya khyung bsnams pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:32b-28: nub sgor rdo rje ske rags ma dang /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-29: rdo rje ser mo ma sku mdog dmar mo gling bu dang rdza rnga chen po'i sgra kho na'o //
K12D0422_H0382:32b-30: lho sgor rdo rje dgod ma dang /
K12D0422_H0382:32b-31: rdo rje nyi ma mo sku mdog ljang gu rdza
K12D0422_H0382:32b-32: rnga dang pi wang gi rol mo'i sgra kho na
K12D0422_H0382:32b-33: ste / ji ltar shar sgor bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor
K12D0422_H0382:32b-34: ma de ltar thams cad kyang rus pa la sogs
K12D0422_H0382:32b-35: ste / pa'i rgyan dang / bzhugs thabs dang /
K12D0422_H0382:33a-1: spyod kyi 'khor lo'i nang na yod pa'i rtsa brgyad gnyis kyi grangs ni /
K12D0422_H0382:33a-2: de dag kun gyi rnam par dag pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-3: sku brgyad bdag nyid kyi ni mgon //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-4: mchod sbyin sgra yis kun tu brtags //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-5: mchod pa de ni mchod sbyin brjod //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-6: rtsa ni kun gyi gnas rab mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:33a-7: gnas ni gdan la sogs pa'i dgyes //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-8: gnas kun gyi ni bla na med //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-9: gsang chen dag pa padma yi //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-10: 'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-11: bde ba yi ni yangs pa'i sar //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-12: rtsa yi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan no //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-13: gnas ni gdan la bya bar grags //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-14: gnas ni rten du brjod pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-15: bde ba 'byung ba'i ngal sos ni //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-16: de yi zhing ni don dam par //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-17: bde ba'i ye shes 'byung ba ste //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-18: tshando har ni 'di ru bshad; ;thig le gsum gyi ye shes bde //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-19: gcig byed pa yi gtan tshigs kyis //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-20: de yi 'dus sar bstan pa yin //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-21: rnal 'byor rgyud du rnyed dka' ba //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-22: gang du tshor ba yod pa ste //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-23: bde ba 'byung ba'i thim de bzhin //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-24: de ni 'di ru dur khrod brjod //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-25: yang na bde ba'i rnam shes so //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-26: gang du bde ba yang dag rnyed //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-27: de ni pi la ba ru grags //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-28: skye dang thim pa'i ye shes te //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-29: gang du bde ba'i zla ba skye //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-30: de ni lam rab tu ni bstan //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-31: 'gro ba'i bdag nyid lam yin no //
K12D0422_H0382:33a-32: bde ba'i rgyal po gang zhig 'gog /
K12D0422_H0382:33b-0: de ni sbyor @33b ba'i ye shes rab //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-1: de ni gnas brgyad dgyes pa yin //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-2: sku brgyad rang gi ngo bo can //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-3: ye shes brgyad kyi bdag nyid bdag /
K12D0422_H0382:33b-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed dka' ba //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-5: rtsa kun gyi ni dag pa'i gzhi; ;de la yang ni rtsa kun gnas //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-6: nye ba'i gnas ni thams cad kun //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-7: lha yi dbang phyug rnam par smin //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-8: bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-9: thig le drug ni rab tu grags //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-10: thig le'i dbus na ye shes yod //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-11: dag gi lam gyis rnyed par dka'//
K12D0422_H0382:33b-12: bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa med //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-13: drug min de bzhin gsum ba min //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-14: gsum dang bral ba gsum par grags /
K12D0422_H0382:33b-15: ye shes rang bzhin de skyed med //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-16: nyi ma'i thig le'i ye shes shar //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-17: 'bad pa yis ni mchod sbyin bya //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-18: gang tshe mchog byung ma shar bar //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-20: zla ba de ni dga' bral dga'//
K12D0422_H0382:33b-21: chags pa 'di ru thim par byed //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-22: nyi ma'i dbus nas zla ba 'byung //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-23: zla ba'i dbus nas nyi ma 'char //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-24: dri ma med phyir yangs par 'gro //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-25: shes rab bdag nyid gzugs kyi phyir //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-26: thams cad la ni tshim par byed //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-27: thams cad kyi ni skye ba'i rgyu //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-28: 'bras bu byed pa'i bdag nyid zla //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-29: rgyu byed bdag nyid zla ba ste //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-31: rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa'i //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-32: bde ba chags chen bdag nyid do //
K12D0422_H0382:33b-33: chags pa chen po dngos med na //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-2: tha mal bde nyid bde ba min //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-3: byol song bag chags rab rmongs pa //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-4: dbang po gnyis kyi bde bar 'dod //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-5: bde ba mchog gi rang rig pa //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-6: chags pa dang ni chags bral med //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-7: bde ba thig le'i nang du ni //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-8: char yang nang du bde ba che //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-9: de gnyis ye shes tshul gyi nang //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-10: rnam par shes pa'i tshul can dang //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-11: rnam par shes dang ye shes bral //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-12: gzhan dang gzhan min nang yod pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-13: sbyor drug gyes ba rnam par shes //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-14: char yang rtsa ba kun brtag bral //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-15: rtog pa spangs pa de nyid ni //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-17: tshor bya tshor byed gnyis las grol //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-18: srid dang mya ngan 'das dag pa'i //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-19: de ni gsang chen de nyid do //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-20: gang du yang ni gsal ma byas //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-21: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-22: smra bar mi bya gang la lar //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-23: rnal 'byor rgyud du mos gyur pa //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-24: lha yi dbang phyug gsal mi bya //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-25: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12D0422_H0382:34a-26: sngags kyi bzlas pa'i rim pa dang /
K12D0422_H0382:34a-27: mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang /
K12D0422_H0382:34a-28: dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
K12D0422_H0382:34a-31: de kho na nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12D0422_H0382:34a-32: de nas mchod pa'i cho ga 'di'i //
K12D0422_H0382:34a-33: nges par bstan pa bdag gis bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-0: @34b thim dang longs spyod dag gis ni //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-2: zla ba nyi ma me tog gis //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-3: sku yi rgyal po nyid la mchod //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-5: mar ngo tshes kyi dang po dbang //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-7: nges par aa yi thig le las //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-8: thim pa 'di yis tshes gnyis pa //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-9: bdud rtsi 'di ni smin phrag tu //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-11: a'a li'i thig le gnyis pas so //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-12: bde ba'i mkhur tshos gnyis nas su //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-13: tshes gsum pa la longs spyod 'gyur //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-14: de la rnam par smin pas 'gro //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-15: a'a li'i thigs pa gsum pas so //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-16: bdud rtsi kos ko'i gnas su ni //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-17: tshes bzhi pa la thim pa 'byung //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-18: de la mgu ba las dga' ba //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-19: bzhi pa'i ye shes thig les so //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-20: bde ba yi ni mgrin gnas su //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-21: tshes lnga pa la longs spyod 'byung //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-22: de la dgyes pas rgyas par 'gyur //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-23: thig le lnga pa'i khengs pas so //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-24: 'dod pa brang gi gnas su ni //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-25: tshes drug pa la thim pa 'byung //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-26: de la bsam gtan las drag po //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-27: thig le drug la gang bas so //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-28: bde ba'i nu ma'i gnas su ni //
K12D0422_H0382:34b-29: tshes bdun pa la dbang ni 'byung //

K12D0422_H0382:39a-5: tshul ni rang byung me yin no //

K12D0422_H0382:39a-7: bzlas pa de ni kham du brjod //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-8: sa 'og dang ni sring mo mar; ;de yi bsreg rdzas rab tu dbul //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-9: ye shes bdud rtsi rnam dag pas //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-10: phrag dog la sogs bsang gtor bya //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-11: dum bu gsum pa'i snod mdun du //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-12: phrag dog bdud rtsis rab tu tshim //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-13: rdor gsum ye shes sa bon gyi //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-14: dag byas dkar byas rim gyis so //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-15: rlung mer bskul byas 'bar bar byas //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-16: bdud rtsi mchog ni zhu bar byed //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-17: ha yi ma mo'i sngags kyis ni //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-18: 'khor lo drug ni rab tshim bya //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-19: ri bo'i ma mo dang bral bas //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-20: phyi nang rtag tu rab tshim bya //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-21: de lta'i sbyin sreg las kyis ni //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-22: lha yi sku ru nges par 'gyur; ;lha yi sku ni bde chen po //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-23: don dam par ni shes pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-25: de ni don dam sbyin sreg go /
K12D0422_H0382:39a-26: dpa' bo gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor ba //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-27: dus kyi gang du steng dbang po //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-28: lte snying bde ba'i padma yi //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-29: rtag bar shes rab mas ni brjod //
K12D0422_H0382:39a-30: de ni sbyin sreg bsreg rdzas ldan //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-0: kun @39b rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-1: shes rab thabs ni phrad pa las //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-2: sbyin sreg las kyi 'bras bu mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:39b-3: myur ba ru ni rnyed pa 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-4: hom khung dha la dgyes pa che //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-5: la la 'di ru dgang gzar dran //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-6: blugs gzar gsang pad sna yi rtse //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-7: mar ni khu ba zla 'od mnyam //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-8: gsang pad zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-9: mar gyi snod du rnam par grags //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-10: blugs gzar dgang gzar mar gyi snod //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-11: rtsa gsum du ni brjod pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-12: bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-13: rlung ma dang ni gnyid ma gnyis //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-14: gcig pa'i dngos po yang dag pas //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-15: ye shes me ni mchog tu 'bar //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-17: gzhan min bde chen man chad do //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-18: mchog gi bdud rtsi rgyun ni 'dzag /
K12D0422_H0382:39b-19: ji ltar mkha' las chu 'bab pa //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-20: rtsa yi dra ba du ma yis //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-22: sku gsum ye shes rdo rje mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:39b-23: rtag tu bsreg rdzas mchod par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-24: me yi kha ru dgang gzar ni //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-25: mar gyis bkang pa dbul bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-26: me ni mchog tu dga' ba ste //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-27: rnam rtog hom shing tshig par byed //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-28: mdud pa'i hom khung gi ni me //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-29: de ni mchog tu dga' rang bzhin //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-30: zhi ba'i zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-31: longs spyod dang ni grol ba bzhin //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-32: sku yi rdo rje rin chen khar //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-33: gsung gi rdo rje dbus kyi dkyil //
K12D0422_H0382:39b-34: thugs kyi rdo rje mdud snying po //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-0: dga' ba yis ni mchod par @40a *//
K12D0422_H0382:40a-1: bya; ;gsung gi rdo rje blugs gzar mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:40a-2: dga' bral dga' ba sku rdo rje //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-3: lhan skyes dga' ba'i ye shes kyi //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-4: dgang blugs kyis ni mchod par bya; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pas /
K12D0422_H0382:40a-5: bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kun brgyal ba dang /
K12D0422_H0382:40a-7: de nas yun ring po zhig nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-8: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la 'dir ye shes
K12D0422_H0382:40a-9: yod dam ci zhes yang ya mtshan du gyur to
K12D0422_H0382:40a-10: // yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das mas phyag
K12D0422_H0382:40a-11: rgya chen pos dam por 'khyud nas ma mchu btung
K12D0422_H0382:40a-12: ba'i bdud rtsi'i mchod sbyin phul te gsang ba'i padma'i
K12D0422_H0382:40a-13: bskor ba dam po'i snyim pa mnyam par sbyor ba
K12D0422_H0382:40a-14: bcings nas gus pas zhus pa /
K12D0422_H0382:40a-15: sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma mgon //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-16: ye shes zab mo dri ma med //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-17: ci yi don phyir de'i lta'i tshig /
K12D0422_H0382:40a-18: 'khor kun gyi ni nang du gsungs //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-19: lhan cig skyes dga'i ye shes gang //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-20: dgang blugs kyis ni mchod pa la //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-22: the tshom chen po skyes par gyur //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-23: gsang ba yi ni gsang ba mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:40a-24: rnal 'byor ma rgyud du ma ru //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-25: mgon pos gang du'ang ma gsungs so //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-26: de tsam yang ni brdar ma mdzad //
K12D0422_H0382:40a-27: lhan cig la ni ye shes yod //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-0: ma gsungs bdag gis @40b thos ma lags //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-1: de ring de ltar the tshom dag /
K12D0422_H0382:40b-2: mnga' bdag chen pos gcad du gsol //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0422_H0382:40b-4: aa la la rab tu ngo mtshar to //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-5: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la ci'i phyir ye shes med //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-6: dad pa chen po dang brtson 'grus can dang ye shes dang ldan pa yang rmongs par 'gyur na /
K12D0422_H0382:40b-7: ye shes med pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ji ltar rnyed /
K12D0422_H0382:40b-8: de bzhin du yang 'dir gzhan pa de ma yin pa'i dpe nyon cig /
K12D0422_H0382:40b-10: du ba las ni mer shes te //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-11: chu skyar las ni chu yin no //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-12: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyi //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-13: rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-14: de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rnyed
K12D0422_H0382:40b-15: pa'i don gyi phyir skyabs sbyin gyi ngo bo ye
K12D0422_H0382:40b-17: tshor bar yongs su shes pas spyod pa'i bdag nyid kyi thabs de ni /
K12D0422_H0382:40b-18: ye shes su bdag gis bshad do //
K12D0422_H0382:40b-19: de bzhin du ji ltar mun nag tu rin po che phra mo'i phra mo yod pa de ni /
K12D0422_H0382:40b-20: rin po che mar me ma yin pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de bas na /
K12D0422_H0382:40b-21: blo gros can gyis rin po che mar me khyer nas tshol bar byed la /
K12D0422_H0382:40b-22: gal te de rnyed na de ci mar me las
K12D0422_H0382:40b-23: rin po che skye'am; 'on kyang mar me'i thabs kyis
K12D0422_H0382:40b-24: mthong ba dang rnyed pa de bzhin du ye shes
K12D0422_H0382:40b-25: kyi mar mes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rin
K12D0422_H0382:40b-26: po che'i rgyal po mthong zhing rnyed kyi /
K12D0422_H0382:41a-3: de bas na ye shes kyi sgra 'di ni /
K12D0422_H0382:41a-4: don mi shes pa'i phyir mkhas pas 'dir the tshom mi bya'o //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-5: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12D0422_H0382:41a-6: mchod pa sna tshogs nges par bstan pa dang /
K12D0422_H0382:41a-7: nang gi sbyin sreg ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0422_H0382:41a-8: de nas gtor ma chen po'i las kyi nges par bstan pa'i don bshad do //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-9: sems can thams cad bsrung don du //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-10: 'bad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-11: bha yi yig 'bru bha gar brjod //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-12: lim gi yig 'bru lim gar bstan //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-14: sems can thams cad kyi ni tshogs //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-16: lha mo de nyid shes bya ste //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-17: thams cad sgra ni dga' ba yin //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-18: sems can don ni mchog tu 'gyur //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-19: tshogs pa de ni dga' bral dga'//
K12D0422_H0382:41a-20: gtor ma de yis bstung ba'i don //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-21: dur khrod yang ni chu yi dogs //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-22: ye shes ldan pas sbyin par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-23: dur khrod dbugs dbyung gi ni gnas //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-24: gsang ba'i padma'i bya gdong ngo //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-26: wa yi yig 'bru lte bar yin; ;sa yi yig 'bru bde ngo bo //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-27: na yi yig 'bru bcos pa med //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-28: dri med ma yi zhu ba'i dga'//
K12D0422_H0382:41a-29: thig le'i ngo bo yi ge bral //
K12D0422_H0382:41a-30: dur khrod dbugs dbyung du ni grags //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-0: @41b zhal bzang bdag gis bshad pa yin //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-1: chu yi ngogs ni rin chen kha //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-2: yang na de ni rtog med ma //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-3: 'byung ba rnams ni bsrung ba'i phyir //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-4: de la gtor ma sbyin par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-5: 'byung ba khu ba ru ni grags //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-6: khu ba sems can 'di ru bstan //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-7: sems can snying po ye shes bde //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-8: bha ga lim ga gnyis las 'byung //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-9: de las bsrung ba'i don du ni //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-10: gtor ma kun tu 'bad de sbyin; ;dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12D0422_H0382:41b-11: 'byung ba bsrung ba'i don du gtor ma chen po
K12D0422_H0382:41b-12: nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco
K12D0422_H0382:41b-13: lnga pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag
K12D0422_H0382:41b-14: rgya chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
K12D0422_H0382:41b-15: po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-16: kye dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug /
K12D0422_H0382:41b-17: 'dir de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /
K12D0422_H0382:41b-18: zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /
K12D0422_H0382:41b-19: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang /
K12D0422_H0382:41b-21: rnam pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du legs par zhus shig /
K12D0422_H0382:41b-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa /
K12D0422_H0382:41b-24: mchog gi bde ba chen po'i 'od kyi rang gi ngo bo //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-25: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-26: sdig pa thams cad zad par byed ma //
K12D0422_H0382:41b-27: bdud thams cad 'joms par byed ma //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-2: ye shes kyi mthar khyab pa /
K12D0422_H0382:42a-3: lte ba'i padma'i dbus nas bzhengs nas bde ba chen pos rab tu tshim par mdzad ma /
K12D0422_H0382:42a-6: dri ma me dpa'i sku nam mkha'i ngo bo legs so legs so //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-7: yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po lha'i
K12D0422_H0382:42a-8: dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das mas gsungs pa khong
K12D0422_H0382:42a-9: du chud pas mchog tu dga' ba chen po'i sems
K12D0422_H0382:42a-11: cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po sprul te
K12D0422_H0382:42a-12: rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa chen
K12D0422_H0382:42a-13: pos mchod pa byas nas sngar gyi dri ba de
K12D0422_H0382:42a-15: de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang /
K12D0422_H0382:42a-16: zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang /
K12D0422_H0382:42a-17: phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang /
K12D0422_H0382:42a-19: rnam pa de dag bdag la bka' stsal du gsol /
K12D0422_H0382:42a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K12D0422_H0382:42a-21: dri ba shin tu zab las zab //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-22: thams cad mkhyen pas rnyed dka' ba //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-23: ji ltar de nyid mtshan nyid ni //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-24: nyon cig da yis bshad par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-25: mtshan nyid las skyes de nyid ni //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-26: de lta mi nan mi mthun no //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-27: rang rig pa ni bdag nyid phyir //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-28: de bas brjod par mi nus so //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-29: de nyid gsum bdag de snang ba //
K12D0422_H0382:42a-30: mtshan mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-0: zla ba'i @42b bde mchog snang ba mched //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-1: nyin mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-2: phyag rgya chen po snang ba thob //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-3: mtshams kyi 'du shes rang ngo bo //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-4: mtha' yi de ni 'od kyi rab //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-5: nyin mo mtshan mo sogs dang bral; ;de ni gnas mchog ye shes te //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-6: blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-7: char yang dang ni thig le'i tshul //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-8: de nyid gsum bdag brjod pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-9: 'khor lo gsum yod me rlung chu; ;dngos po'i 'du shes rang ngo bo //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-10: tshul tsam zla ba yi ni bde //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-11: sa yi 'khor lor bde ni mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:42b-12: de ni rten gyi 'du shes can //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-13: lha yi dbang phyug shes par bya //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-14: phyag rgya chen po 'di ni mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:42b-15: nam mkhar ye shes 'du shes so //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-16: de yi mtha' yi gzhan gyi mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:42b-17: bde chen mchog gi nam mkhar ro //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-18: de ni rnal 'byor ngo bor grags //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-19: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rab //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-20: de ni 'khor lo drug dbus gnas //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-21: rnam shes drug gi rang ngo bo //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-22: dngos po rten la sogs bye brag /
K12D0422_H0382:42b-23: bzhir ni bya bar yod pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-24: de nyid gsum bdag bye brag gis //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-25: de ni rnam pa gsum du dbye //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-26: mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams bral phyir //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-27: gcig pu yi ni bde ba che //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-28: rang bzhin bstan pa gang la lar //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-29: mchog gi nam mkha' gang la lar //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-30: la lar 'od rab kyi ni gnas //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-31: la lar dga' bar dran pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-32: la lar mchog gi dga' ba ste //
K12D0422_H0382:42b-33: la lar dga' bral dga' ba 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-1: dbye; ;lhan skyes gcig pu rtag tu shar //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-2: du mar smra bas ci zhig bya //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-3: 'di kun bdag nyid lhan cig skyes //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-4: kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni; ;chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-5: don dam pa yi rang bzhin ni //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-6: yang dag rtog pa'i gnas med do //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-7: thabs la sogs pa'i rim pa yis //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-8: bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur; ;bla ma mtho ris thar pa'i bla //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-9: bla ma ye shes bla ma bde //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-10: bla ma ston pa bla ma mgon //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-11: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-12: bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin las //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-13: mchog gi gnas ni rnyed par 'gyur; ;tshe 'di yis ni phyag rgya che //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-14: dngos grub rnyed par the tshom med //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-15: sa bcu yi ni dbang phyug bdag /
K12D0422_H0382:43a-16: de yi bka' drin gyis ni sla //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-17: de bas bla ma las lhag gzhan //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-18: ston pa chen po ga la yod //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-19: gang zhig bla mas bstan bcos ni //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-20: mdzad dam bshad pa gang yin yang //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-21: de ni bstan bcos de tshad ma //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-22: de ni de nyid 'khrul pa med //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-23: slob dpon gsung dang bdag gis smras //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-24: de la bye brag mi dbye 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-26: bla mas mdzad pa'i bstan bcos gang //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-27: de la sgra dang sgra ngan du; ;lha yi dbang phyug brtag mi bya //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-28: snyan ngag zlos gang bstan bcos las //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-29: sgra dang sgra ngan brtag bya yi //
K12D0422_H0382:43a-30: sngags kyi bstan bcos gtan la phab //

K12D0422_H0382:58a-5: nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-7: las la mkhas pas bri bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-9: padma'i nang du char yang bya //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-10: char yang dang ldan sna tshogs 'dab //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-11: char yang gi nang thig le ste //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-12: de yi steng du rdo rje bri //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-14: rdo rje gri gug gis ni bskor //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-15: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-16: rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-17: sna tshogs bum pa dang ldan pa //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-18: dkyil 'khor rab kyi mchog ni bya //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-20: byang du de bzhin padmo 'o; ;nub kyi 'dab mar rin po che //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-21: lho ru ral gri bsgreng ba 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-22: padma gzhan rnams thod pa ni //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-23: bdud rtsi lnga yis rab tu gang //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-24: dung gzhu de bzhin ri rab dang //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-25: rab tu 'bar ba yi ni me //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-26: me mtshams la sogs rim bzhin bya //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-27: 'bad pa yis ni yongs su bskor //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-28: shar gyi sgor ni dpag bsam shing //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-29: byang du 'bras bu sa bon dang //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-30: nub tu rin chen sdong bu dang /
K12D0422_H0382:58a-31: lho ru sna tshogs rdo rje 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-32: sgo yi phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-33: 'od dang ldan pas bskar bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:58a-34: lha mo chen mo de lta bu'i //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-0: dkyil 'khor ye @58b shes sbyin bdag po //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-1: dam tshig chen po dang ldan pas //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-2: rab tu 'bad pa yis ni bya //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-3: dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po'i phyir //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-4: des na bdag ni rab tshim bya //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-5: dpal ye shes thig le las; dbang bskur ba blang ba dang /
K12D0422_H0382:58b-6: phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0422_H0382:58b-9: dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo dang //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-10: bskyed pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0422_H0382:58b-12: dga' ba las ni mchog dga' ba //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-13: mchog dga' ba las dga' bral dga'//

K12D0422_H0382:58b-15: dga' ba kun gyi de nyid do //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-17: de lta'i rig pa mgon chen po //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-18: rig pa sngar gyi gzhung ngam ci //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-19: mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag /
K12D0422_H0382:58b-21: go tra ba las s'a lu ni //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-22: gang du yang ni mthong mi 'gyur //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-23: dga' bral las ni lhan cig skyes //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-24: bde min dga' bral sdug bsngal des //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-25: dga' ba kun ni 'joms par byed //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-26: mchog gi dbang phyug dga' bral 'di //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-27: dga' ba kun dang mi mthun no //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-28: dga' ba las ni mchog dga' ba //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-29: mchog dga' ba las shin tu dgyes //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-30: bcom ldan mkha' 'gro de rigs lags //
K12D0422_H0382:58b-31: yang na mchog las lhan skyes so //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-2: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma de bden //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-3: dga' bral las ni lhan skyes min //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-4: 'od kyang de bsrubs pa las yod //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-5: de min lhan skyes gang du gnas //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-6: dga' ba kun dang mi mnyam ste //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-7: dga' ba kun ni 'joms byed pa //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-8: 'di skad smra ba shin tu mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:59a-9: don dam pa yi tshig yin no //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-10: dga' kun 'gro ba yang gcig pu //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-12: sprin med snying ga'i nam mkha' ru //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-13: ye shes nyi ma rab mdzes shing //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-14: dpal ldan ye shes thig le rgyud //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-15: nam yang de ni thos ma yin //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ni mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:59a-17: lha mo de ni gang las rnyed //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-18: rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-19: du ma'i rgyud du bshad na yang //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-20: de lta mod kyi rgyud 'di yi //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-21: bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-22: de skad smra ba'i rgyud gzhan kun //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-23: dge ba'i yid dang ldan yang yin //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-24: 'di ru dang ba med gyur na //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-26: mdo sde la sogs gsung rab kun //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-27: dad cing gus pa kho na yin //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-28: gang phyir rgyud kun gyi snying po //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-29: de phyir rgyud 'di rab kyi mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:59a-31: sbas pa'i yi ge drang ba gang //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-32: snying po ye shes 'bras bu ste //
K12D0422_H0382:59a-33: nye ba'i snying po de ni mgon //
K12D0422_H0382:59b-0: de ni de ring gsal @59b bar mdzod //
K12D0422_H0382:59b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0422_H0382:59b-2: sngags ni shin tu gsal ba mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:59b-3: de lta na yang gsal bar byas //

K12D0422_H0382:59b-8: h'a sv'a ta pha h'um h'um ye m'a ksha la ba ma h'a ma ye da ma dzre ba aom//
K12D0422_H0382:59b-9: h'a sv'a ta pha h'um h'um ra sa wi ra sa aom//
K12D0422_H0382:59b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12D0422_H0382:59b-11: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i
K12D0422_H0382:59b-12: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa
K12D0422_H0382:59b-13: dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa rnams
K12D0422_H0382:59b-14: kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
K12D0422_H0382:59b-16: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K12D0422_H0382:59b-17: sngon med ba'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyi chun po 'phyang ba dang /
K12D0422_H0382:59b-22: rig pa 'dzin pas byas pa rmad du byung ba'i chos gos dang /
K12D0422_H0382:59b-23: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12D0422_H0382:59b-25: nam mkha' las nor bu'i char bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi rtsar babs par gyur to //
K12D0422_H0382:59b-26: de nas nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12D0422_H0382:59b-27: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bstod pas bstod pa /
K12D0422_H0382:59b-28: sangs rgyas kun gyis ku gcig pu //
K12D0422_H0382:59b-29: legs so legs so bcom ldan 'das //
K12D0422_H0382:59b-30: shin tu rmad byung ye shes che //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-3: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-4: yang dag mchog gi gsang ba 'di //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-5: rnyed par dka' ba don dam pa //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-6: dpal ldan ye shes thig le'i rgyud //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-7: ye shes rgya mtsho gtan la phab //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-8: de lta bu'i tshogs kyi mchod pa byas nas nam
K12D0422_H0382:60a-9: mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs
K12D0422_H0382:60a-10: pa rnams de kho na nyid kyi bsam gtan la
K12D0422_H0382:60a-11: bzhugs so // bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa /
K12D0422_H0382:60a-13: bde ba chen po gcig pu'i sku //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-14: tshig rgyas pa yi snying po'i don //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-15: mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-16: mchog gi dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0422_H0382:60a-17: nyon cig lha mo gsang ba'i mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:60a-18: rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-19: gsang sna padma'i snying po ni //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-20: tshogs kyi gnas su 'di ru brjod //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-21: rdo rje'i rtse mo kha phye'i phyir //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-22: de ni rgyas par brjod pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-23: yang na thams cad kyi ni tshogs //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-24: snying po bya yi gdong mar dran //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-25: de la rdo rje rtse mo yis //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-26: phye ba de ni rgyas par brjod //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-27: ai da ping+gal gnyis kyi dbus //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-28: rtog med ye shes ngo bo nyid //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-29: bsrub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-30: rdo rje'i mthe chung rtse mo las //
K12D0422_H0382:60a-31: reg byas gang gis bde bar 'dzag /
K12D0422_H0382:60a-32: zhal bzang de ni tshig rgyas pa'o //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-0: lte @60b pa'i gnas nas smin 'khor lo //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-1: de nas gnas pa'i rna ba 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-2: spyi rtse tshangs pa'i bu ga ni //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-3: tshig rgyas pa ni gsum du dran //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-4: ma ni srub dang srub pa ste //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-5: ra ni dga' ba yin par brjod //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-6: mu ni lha mo sgrol ma yin //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-7: da yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i gzugs //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-8: gha yi yig 'bru sgra ru grags //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-9: ta yi yig 'bru gsal bar byed //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-10: na ni lte ba'i gsang ba'i mthar; ;de yi dbus su rtag tu shar //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-11: zla ba'i sku dang 'dra ba gsal //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-12: nyi ma bye ba'i mnyam pa'i 'od //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-14: byang chub kyi ni lam rab ster //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-15: de ni gsang ba ye shes che //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-16: rang bzhin tshig gis rab gsal byas //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-17: 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-18: su la'ang sbyin par mi bya 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-19: dpal ye shes thig le las /
K12D0422_H0382:60b-20: tshig rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K12D0422_H0382:60b-21: de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-22: ye shes rab mchog gang gis smras; ;de kho na nyid bdag don zab //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-23: des bstan la sogs bye brag tu //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-24: srog gi dbyug pa bzhugs thabs nas //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-25: rtsa dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba drug /
K12D0422_H0382:60b-26: thig le shar ba nub pa dang /
K12D0422_H0382:60b-27: 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid dang //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-29: dbang gi rim pa de bzhin no //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-30: srung ba'i 'khor lo lha mo che //
K12D0422_H0382:60b-31: snying po sngags kyi rgyal po nyid //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-2: thim dang longs spyod dang ni dbang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-3: rdo rje lha mo ye shes sku //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-4: gsang ba'i sgra yang de bzhin no //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-5: srung ba'i dam tshig la sogs dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-6: dpal ldan sbyin sreg don dam par //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-7: bsrub dang srub pa'i dgyes pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-8: sngags kyi bzlas pa mchod sbyin dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-9: gnas brgyad sku yi ngo bo dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-10: dga' ba la sogs pa yi mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:61a-11: dur khrod rnam rtog med par grags //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-12: chu ngogs rtog pa med pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-13: snang ba la sogs mchog ye shes //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-14: dngos po la sogs bde ba che //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-15: thog ma tha ma dur khrod brgyad //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-16: zhing la sogs pa bstan pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-17: rlung gi de nyid snying po'i don //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-19: nyer 'gro sbyor ba rab mchog dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-20: nyid ni ye shes thig le dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-21: rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:61a-22: sa la sogs pa'i bdag po dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyabs dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-24: rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-25: phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-26: gsang ba yi ni don dam par //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-27: de nyid mchod pas bskul ba dang //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-28: shes rab ye shes ji bzhin no //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-30: zhal bzang tshig rgyas bstan pa 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-31: gtor ma 'byung la phan don du //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-32: sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed //
K12D0422_H0382:61a-33: de ni bde ba chen po'i mtha'//
K12D0422_H0382:61b-0: @61b de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po'i don //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-1: bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid don //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-2: gsang chen bdag gis rab tu bshad //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-3: de nyid sum cu drug bdag po //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-4: char yang ye shes tshor byed do //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-5: thig le ye shes bdag nyid tshor //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-6: de ni sum cu bdun dbang phyug /
K12D0422_H0382:61b-7: tshul gyis ye shes bdag nyid tshor //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-8: de ni sum cu brgyad dbang phyug /
K12D0422_H0382:61b-9: tshul tsa ma ye shes tshor byed pa //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-10: dgu lhag sum cu de nyid do //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-11: mchog shes pa yi rnal 'byor gang //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-12: bzhi bcu'i mnga' bdag chen po 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-13: gzhan mchog gsung lam brjod du med //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-14: rnam par dag pa de nyid mchog /
K12D0422_H0382:61b-15: thams cad de kho'i bdag nyid phyir //

K12D0422_H0382:61b-20: bcom ldan 'das ni mchog dga' ba //

K12D0422_H0382:61b-23: rnam par dag pa ji ltar lags //

K12D0422_H0382:61b-25: de nyid sgom pa rnam par dag /
K12D0422_H0382:61b-26: skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig /
K12D0422_H0382:61b-27: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-28: nang gi stong pa de nyid do //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-29: spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-30: sa dang stobs dang ye shes so //
K12D0422_H0382:61b-31: phyag rnams stong nyid rnam par dag /
K12D0422_H0382:61b-32: brgyad gnyis phyag ni stong pa nyid //

K12D0422_H0382:62a-2: thod pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid //
K12D0422_H0382:62a-3: sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa //
K12D0422_H0382:62a-4: 'jigs byed ma ni brgyad gnyis dbye //
K12D0422_H0382:62a-5: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni //
K12D0422_H0382:62a-6: zhabs bzhi ru ni dran pa 'o //

K12D0422_H0382:62a-10: zhal bzang de phyir g-yas brkyang ba //
K12D0422_H0382:62a-11: lha mo g-yon bskum mya ngan 'das //
K12D0422_H0382:62a-12: ye shes sku nyid bzhugs pa'o //

K12D0422_H0382:62a-14: lha mo de phyir bzhengs pa 'o //
K12D0422_H0382:62a-15: gzugs brgyad rnam par dag pa yis //

K12D0422_H0382:62a-18: shes rab thabs gnyis bdag nyid do //
K12D0422_H0382:62a-19: gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa'i phyir //
